Structure of the SRS (Software Requirements Specification)

The purpose of this Software Requirements Specification(SRS) document is to provide all the information about the doubt clarification feature. This is a legal contract between client/user and the developers. This SRS document includes all the user interfaces hardware requirements, software requirements, functional and non-functional requirements. All the points are written using simple English. Functional requirements describe the features and the steps of the system and the non-functional requirements explains the attributes of the system. Like security, reliability, performance. The main user of this system is teachers and the students of the school. End users and the developers can get a brief idea about the final product using srs document.

This document contains details of the doubt clarification module. The purpose of this SRS document is to guide developers in selecting system attributes. When a student studying or answering to the past papers they can occur some problems about the subject. Then they can ask that question from the teacher or the internet based systems for more clarification. But the problem is student should go to the school to meet teachers and it takes some time to clarify their doubts. There are some existing internet-based systems to give an answer to users but it may too heavy or too poor for student’s knowledge. But this proposed system overcomes all these types of questions easily. This system finds the answers to student’s questions using references and student can mark their own answer to the same question by giving their answer to the system. It may take very few seconds to generate answers and to mark. This product may give an answer for student’s subject related questions only and the system should have previously added references for a relevant subject and the question type, to answer the question. This feature may marks only structured type questions and question should be direct and fewer words. This system does not mark math questions and graph or diagram type questions. Goals of this system are teachers should upload references books to the system with a subject and the grade and teachers can add most important chapters of the book also using this feature. The system should take the answer and the question of the student as system inputs. Then this module answer for the student’s subject related doubts according to references books added by the teachers to the system. Finally, this system gives a correct, relevant and summarized answer for a student with a minimum time and effort.

The main goal of this student doubt clarification feature is to help students to clear up their subject related doubts. The system should identify the grade of the student and the subject of the question for further classifications. The student should add their question to

the system and system should find the correct answer to student’s question . Firstly system gets correct reference books according to student added grade and the subjects. Doubts clarification module is a sub-function of the Automated structure, diagram question marking and doubt clarification system. Using doubts clarification module students can clarify their subject related questions. The student has logins to the system. Login id and the password will be given by the school using admin function. The teacher also has access to this feature. Mainly teacher should use that login to add references books to the system. When teacher adds books, the system asks subject and the relevant grade of the references. The teacher can define important chapters using this system. When saving chapters system asks starting and ending page nos of the chapter. A student can add their questions and the answers to the system to get an answer to that questions. The system select references according to student grade and the subject. Then it finds related chapters from the references and summarized it. Finally, the summarized text will be shown to the student. If a student has an own answer to that question, the system will check how much it similar to the system generated an answer.

There are some existing systems to clarify student’s subject related questions and the doubts, but those systems are not given a correct answer to students Because most of the existing systems get information using a web search. But the problem is, sometimes answer is too heavy or too poor for students knowledge and for the age. START Natural Language Question Answering System is one of the existing systems to answer users questions. It answers only for some set of questions. Most of the questions it gets an error message by saying “I don’t Know the answer” For this system, they use mainly use NLP . One of the very famous sites it StackOverflow. But the difference between stack overflow and the proposing system is, it doesn’t give the answer in same time. the student should wait much more time to get an answer. It can be a one day to many days. And there is no guarantee whether the answer is correct or not. There is another system called poweraqua which is providing answers to user questions. But it displays web answer for user’s questions. Therefore that system also shows some improper answers for users . Although several text classification algorithms have been tried out in previous researchers in the area of Information Retrieval and Filtering, since the hundred percent accuracy has not been achieved with the algorithms that have been used, more research can be done on the other Text Classification algorithms to figure out an algorithm that has much higher performance than achieved so far. For proposed doubt clarification feature, hope to try out NLP and the ontology mainly. First, need to convert pdf formatted references into XML format and need to extract correct pages related to the question. For that, there are some tools like PDFMiner, pdftoxml, pypdf2xml and etc. After analyzing best tool, wish to use it for the final product. For information retrieval part, plan to use NLP annotation algorithms. And to get the correct answer, the system should identify parts of speech, word senses, and the synonyms. After retrieving information system should summarize those answers. For summarization also plan to apply NLP algorithms. There are two approaches to summarize a text. First one is extractive and the other one is an abstractive method. Extractive method summarize the text by ranking most relevant phrases. The abstractive method makes new sentences to capture the original text. To this system hope to use extractive method summarizing. Using named entity recognition approach plan to identify exact answer from the related information for direct questions.

Main users of this feature are students and teachers. Teachers should upload reference books to the system. Then the student can add their questions to the system to get a correct answer according to student age and the subject. To use this system student and teachers should have at least two years of computer and web usage experiences.

● English will be the only language supported by the GUIs. ● In doubt clarification feature, it answer for the structured type questions only. And it doesn't mark graph type questions. ● For this feature, user should submit direct questions with few words. ● Structured type answers should have less than 5 lines. Other constraints: ● php and python will be the main implementation languages. ● The Internet connection is also a constraint for the application. Since the application fetches data from the database over the Internet, it is crucial that there is an Internet connection for the application to function.
● For doubts clarification feature teachers should submit correct and most relevant books as references to the system.

● The teacher should be able to add references to the system according to age and the subject ● The student should be able to add a question to the system with or without the answer to the question. ● The system must answer the student's question. ● Teachers can delete and update the added references.
● This feature should develop as moodle support plugin.
● System Should keep track of students marks and the feedbacks to view students progress
